Job Description: The primary objective is to develop superior risk management controls that ensure the safety of all stakeholders working on or near traffic. We do this with Traffic Management Plans, and Emergency Response Plans. The ideal candidate should have the following characteristics: Knowledgeable with RapidPlan basics - draw roads, add signs, implement distances, and use standard templates, as well as understand and utilise layers, icons, notes, and references. Must be knowledgeable on AutoCAD fundamentals demonstrating the ability to draw a basic road layout. Effectively use mapping tools (i.e. Google Earth, Street Directories, and Nearmap) to scope work area locations - understand mapping and topography and be able to look up latitude and longitude. Office 365 skills with a focus toward Outlook, Word, and Excel. Must be able to enter job data into tracking spreadsheet. Understand the need for standards and be able to lookup, apply, and reference standards and regulations. Understand the need for hazard control and prepare a basic risk assessment for a worksite. Demonstrated analytical, problem-solving, and interpersonal skills. Have a keen attention to detail and accurately reference provided legislative requirements and technical manuals. Must be able to work in a team environment Can take client instructions and information and implement into risk controls.
